metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31799 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Bottle before 0.12.20 mishandles errors during early request binding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-bottle - 0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2
python3-bottle - 0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-bottle package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.12.13-1ubuntu0.2').
